titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on potassium 1,3-dioxo-1H,3H-naphthol[1,8-cd]pyran-6-sulfonate.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on potassium 1,3-dioxo-1H,3H-naphthol[1,8-cd]pyran-6-sulfonate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on potassium 1,3-dioxo-1H,3H-naphthol[1,8-cd]pyran-6-sulfonate.
